column5: Looking for boat launch recommendations.  Preferably at the mouth of the Thames.  Appears that there are several in the area... Good bad, expensive, cheap, free?  Thanks in advance!
They're both free. The one at Lighthouse Cove sux, I'd use the one at the End of Jeanette's Creek rd. Easy to get to, exit 63, Jeanette's Creek rd. is literally right off the off ramp!

The one at Lighthouse Cove is not the greatest....but if your boat is not too huge it should be ok. I saw them doing work on the Jeannette's creek launch (2 years ago?) so I imagine it is better than L. Cove. Personally I use the LC launch when I plan on fishing the lake and the J. Creek launch if I plan to fish the river

They're both free. The one at Lighthouse Cove sux, I'd use the one at the End of Jeanette's Creek rd. Easy to get to, exit 63, Jeanette's Creek rd. is literally right off the off ramp!  Nice! Thank you sir!
